TopicTitle: How to Submit a Crash Report?

Articles.Content:
Hi All,

I searched the subject title in the search box, but it found no articles.  There is an official or pinned article that says something about putting crash files in a shared file service like "dropbox", but it is not intuitively obvious to me how that works.  I was thinking there should be just a forum that you can submit your crash reports as an attachment to a Forum Post.  Can some one explain the mechanics of submitting a crash report to the developers?

Thanks

Chris

Hi Chris.

It's best to put them here on the KSP bug tracker, you can attach the individual files, your saves and dxdiag system report.

Hope this helps!
